kpi.name: M8006C216

kpi_info.title: Successfully established additional E-RABs of QCI2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established additional E-RABs of QCI2. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi.kpi_alias: Successfully established additional E-RABs of QCI2
